member.name: M:ChemstationMSFileReader.clsChemstationDataMSFileReader.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Open the specified data file and read the data headers
member.param: Path to the file to read

member.name: M:ChemstationMSFileReader.clsChemstationDataMSFileReader.GetSpectrum(System.Int32,ChemstationMSFileReader.clsSpectralRecord@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Returns the mass spectrum at the specified index
member.param: TIC value as reported by the Index; this value has been scaled down by some sort of polynomial transformation
member.returns: True if success, false if an error

member.name: M:ChemstationMSFileReader.clsChemstationDataMSFileReader.ReadHeaders(System.String)
member.summary: Open the data file and read the header sections from the data file
member.param: Path to the file to read
member.returns: True if success, false if an error
member.remarks: The file handle will remain open until this class is disposed of

member.name: M:ChemstationMSFileReader.clsChemstationDataMSFileReader.ReadIndexRecords(System.IO.FileStream@)
member.summary: Reads the index entries (aka directory records)
member.returns: True if success, false if an error

member.name: M:ChemstationMSFileReader.clsChemstationDataMSFileReader.ReadNormalizationRecords(System.IO.FileStream@)
member.summary: Reads the 10 normalization records from the data file
member.returns: True if success, false if an error

member.name: M:ChemstationMSFileReader.clsSpectralRecord.#ctor(System.IO.FileStream@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Populate a spectrum object with the data at the specified byte offset

member.name: M:ChemstationMSFileReader.clsSpectralRecord.Clear
member.summary: Initialize the variables and data structures

member.name: M:ChemstationMSFileReader.clsSpectralRecord.ReadFromFile(System.IO.FileStream@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Read the spectrum at the specified byte offset

member.name: M:ChemstationMSFileReader.clsSpectralRecord.ReadPackedAbundance(System.IO.FileStream@)
member.summary: Read packed abundance stored as 2-bit scale with 14 bit mantissa

member.name: M:ChemstationMSFileReader.clsByteConverter.ReadInt16SwapBytes(System.IO.FileStream@)
member.summary: Reads an Int16 from the filestream Swaps bytes prior to converting
member.returns: The value, as an Int16 number

member.name: M:ChemstationMSFileReader.clsByteConverter.ReadUInt16SwapBytes(System.IO.FileStream@)
member.summary: Reads an UInt16 from the filestream Swaps bytes prior to converting
member.returns: The value, as an Int32 number

member.name: M:ChemstationMSFileReader.clsByteConverter.ReadInt32SwapBytes(System.IO.FileStream@)
member.summary: Reads an Int32 from the filestream Swaps bytes prior to converting
member.returns: The value, as an Int32 number

member.name: M:ChemstationMSFileReader.clsByteConverter.ReadSingleSwapBytes(System.IO.FileStream@)
member.summary: Reads a 4-byte single (real) from the filestream Swaps bytes prior to converting
member.returns: The value, as a single-precision number

member.name: M:ChemstationMSFileReader.clsByteConverter.ReadString(System.IO.FileStream@,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Reads a fixed-length string from the filestream Optionally advances the reader one byte after reading the string
member.param: If true, then advances the read an extra byte after reading the string

member.summary: Convert byte-offset stored in words into bytes

member.summary: Read header from the specified file
